product_name: Switch Arya Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses - Women's
long_description: A fusion of fashion, performance and comfort for women, Switch Arya Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses deliver optical splendor in any setting. Choose your protection with 2 sets of lenses. Interchangeable lenses let you customize your needs; all lenses block 100% UV rays and reduce glare. Black Leopard, Shiny Black Teal and Crystal Purple frames come with polarized gray-tint lenses for true colors and glare reduction on bright, sunny days. Chocolate Mint Fade frames come with polarized amber-tinted lenses that enhance contrast and cut glare. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare from water, snow, sand and pavement for increased visual acuity and decreased eye strain. All frames include a second set of non-polarized rose/amber-tint lenses for low light. Large panoramic curved lens profile and light management technology offer spectacular peripheral views, maximum coverage, protection and superior visual clarity. The Switch Arya Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses come with a hard case.
short_description: A fusion of fashion, performance and comfort for women, Switch Arya Polarized Interchangeable Sunglasses deliver optical splendor in any setting. Choose your protection with 2 sets of lenses.
